description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing global application state in a frontend React application. It includes state slices for team info, quizzes, saved items, feedback, plan details, analytics, persona, gamification points, badges, history, and associated public actions for updating state, fetching data, and managing gamification badges and points.

methods.name: useZStore
methods.description: Main function creating the Zustand store with various state slices and public API methods.

methods.name: selectGamification
methods.description: Selector function to access the gamification slice of the state.

methods.name: selectPoints
methods.description: Selector to access the total gamification points.

methods.name: selectBadges
methods.description: Selector to access the list of badges earned.

methods.name: selectHistory
methods.description: Selector to access the gamification event history.

methods.name: selectLastEarnedBadgeId
methods.description: Selector to get the ID of the last earned badge, used for UI effects.

ctags.name: selectGamification
ctags.pattern: /^export const selectGamification = (s) => s.gamification || { points: 0, badges: [], history: [] /
